But this is not the place for a dissertation on so 4 large a subject. Yet I do not think it amiss to set forth what principles I followed during this war in my formal statements of opinion.

You have not forgotten, Brutus, what I said after the death of Caesar and your memorable Ides of March, about your lost opportunities and the storm which was about to break over the state.
